subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: David Brewer, the new Open tournament director, described this year and next year as a period of unprecedented change, the most since the U.S.T.A. built Arthur Ashe Stadium in 1997.
snippet: David Brewer, the new Open tournament director, described this year and next year as a period of unprecedented change, the most since the U.S.T.A. built Arthur Ashe Stadium in 1997.
